text:
One of the staff members assisted my family and me with an exchange process. It was quite complicated due to the 50% off promotion on the second item. The staff member patiently checked multiple times to find the best way to complete the exchange.

I really appreciate their patience and understanding with me and my family. Excellent service!

Excellent customer service from Jarald. From the moment we step into the shop, he is so approachable and always there attending to my questions. Consistently assisting me and answering my query about different type of jeans. Well done and thanks Jarald!

Excellent service from Khalid. He was attentive and gave good suggestions. Wasn‚Äôt pushy at all. Always had a genuine smile on him and immediately put me at ease. Levi‚Äôs, you have indeed found a gem üëç

I would like to say thank you to Sam Lim, who, one way or another always attend to me well whenever I ask some enquiries about Levis' promotions on JP branch, attend to me when choosing something I want to buy Levis' products... i would like to rate him 5 stars... thanks a lot

The 5 stars rating is for Elena, the filipina lady who assisted us during Black Friday sale. Her customer care is superb! She made our shopping experience fun and worth it. She's definitely an asset in the team.
